title: Lagging
body: I have 60ms per my thingy in the top right corenr, yet im having sometimes 2 second response times.... Riot, Fix This

replies.body: When you mentioned 2 second response times, it almost sounds like the entire game is freezing periodically for you? Cases like this can sometimes be traced back to packet loss, so let's be sure to check for that first. You can use our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and your latest network logs to check to see if your connection is able to reach our servers reliably or not.
